name: WalkEEG
body:
### This is WalkEEG
WalkEEG is an open source system of [Brain-Computer-Interface](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brain%E2%80%93computer_interface).

It is designed for developing science research and providing high tech 'toy' for Makers.

### Why WalkEEG?
You may know [Neurosky](http://www.neurosky.com/zh-Hans/default.aspx) or [Emotiv](http://www.emotiv.com/).

But they aren't open source. Therefore, scientist or maker can not revise them to adopt their own design or application.

WalkEEG is opensource, both hardware and software. Furthermore, we provide recommended [BCI headset design](http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:139725) for 3D-print.

### Resources
[Github repository](https://github.com/WalkEEG)

[Evernote shared note](http://goo.gl/v1xJOU)

[Google Group](walkeeg@googlegroups.com)

### LICENCE
All hardware design are licenced by [CreativeCommons:Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/)

All software are licenced by [GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)

### Authors and Contributors
We hack at [Chaihuo Maker Space](http://www.chaihuo.org/) in Shenzhen.We are a team ,Most of us are from [SZDIY](http://szdiy.org/) or a medical entrepreneur team called 'NOCI',and others are attracted by this project. We have different background, scientist, engineering, mechanician, financial analyst, student, designer, seller......

I really don't know how these people can do what a work finally, but the collision of thought really caught my imagination.

So I put this project onto [Github](https://github.com/WalkEEG). We need more people to helping us!


### Contact
